summary: In this conversation, the customer was unhappy with their experience with Contoso Wireless after downgrading their phone service. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and asked the customer to provide more details about the issues they were experiencing. After learning that the customer was having trouble with reception, connection speed, and internet access, the agent explained that this was likely due to the downgrade of their plan. The agent also offered to explore different plans that may be better suited for the customer's needs.
